Package com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.lobby

Class ChangeSettingsPacket

java.lang.Object
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.Packet
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.ServerPacket
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.SessionGameCheckPacket
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.lobby.ChangeSettingsPacket
public class ChangeSettingsPacket extends SessionGameCheckPacket
Allows given user to change the settings of the given game if they are the current host. May return failure if given settings aren't valid
